data.title: Train Simulator Addons
data.meta_description: FAST LINE GAMES | Train Simulator Addons
data.text:
2024-08-16 - Rating option has been improved for the routes.

Now you can submit routes ratings by category, how you like the asset placement, and scenario quality.

Categories are OHE Placement, Tracks Layout, Signals Placement, Scenery Placement, and Scenario Quality.

2024-07-26 - New update of FLG application v5.8.4

1.) Application will create a shortcut icon on the desktop automatically ("FLG x32" or "FLG x64").

2.) "Installed/Not-Installed" filter has been removed. "Light Blue" = Installed addons, "Light Green" = Update available.

2024-06-11 - 2nd Anniversary Offer of FAST LINE GAMES

Anniversary offer has been announced, please check the countdown and offer timing on FLG main webpage: https://fastlinegames.com

2024-06-06 - A new update is available for WAP-4 Locomotive

A new update is available for WAP-4 Locomotive with six new liveries. Check product page for more information: https://upanel.fastlinegames.com/addons.php?action=viewProduct&id=9

2024-05-25 - A new update is available for WAP-4 Locomotive

A new update is available for WAP-4 Locomotive with Mid Lamp & AI Variants. Check product page for more information: https://upanel.fastlinegames.com/addons.php?action=viewProduct&id=9

2024-03-24 - A new update is available for WAP-4 Locomotive

A new update is available for WAP-4 Locomotive. Check product page for more information: https://upanel.fastlinegames.com/addons.php?action=viewProduct&id=9

2024-03-20 - 70% off on Train Simulator Classic till 28th March

Grab the best deal on Train Simulator Classic visit : https://store.steampowered.com/app/24010/Train_Simulator_Classic/

2024-02-24 - DMG Offer upto 50%

Highest ever on all of the products of Brijen Chauhan, up to 50% off. Grab it before March 1.

2024-02-09 - 75% off on Train Simulator Classic till 12 February

Grab the best deal on Train Simulator Classic visit : https://store.steampowered.com/app/24010/Train_Simulator_Classic/

2024-02-04 - Important news for all

Hello all, There is important news for all. A group of scammers will contact you to share your credentials or Railworks files. They will claim that they are from FLG, and they will ban your FLG account to mislead you. They will try to provide you with free, modified FLG addons. Please don't trust such people. Never share your account details or FLG files, and don't receive any files from them.

2023-12-06 - New update of FLG application v5.8.2

New update of FLG application v5.8.2

2023-11-13 - Important news for all

Hello all, There is important news for all. A few people are reselling our FLG addons by making some modifications. Please don't purchase from them. They will use "AnyDesk," "TeamViewer," or any other remote desktop applications for the installation. They can take the data from your system or place any unwanted data or malware in it. There could be malware or hacktools in their modified addon files.

2023-11-11 - Re-scheduling the Diwali offer

We are re-scheduling our Diwali offer for November 16, 2023. For more information visit: https://fastlinegames.com

2023-10-18 - A new update is available for Pathankot - Katra line.

A new update is available for Pathankot - Katra line. Check product page for more information: https://upanel.fastlinegames.com/addons.php?action=viewProduct&id=60

2023-10-06 - A new update is available for Northern Railway v1 - Beta (NRv1-Beta)

A new update is available for Northern Railway v1 - Beta (NRv1-Beta). Check product page for more information: https://upanel.fastlinegames.com/addons.php?action=viewProduct&id=17

2023-09-30 - A new update is available for Indian Railways Signals (Beta)

A new update is available for Indian Railways Signals (Beta). Check product page for more information: https://upanel.fastlinegames.com/addons.php?action=viewProduct&id=35

2023-09-30 - A new update is available for Tracks, Signboard, and Advance OHE.

A new update is available for Tracks, Signboard, and Advance OHE. Check product page for more information: https://upanel.fastlinegames.com/addons.php?action=viewProduct&id=1

2023-06-25 - News regarding WCR v1 or v2 routes

Hello all, There is important news for all members. From today, WCR v1 or WCR v2 routes can't be purchased or downloaded from fastlinegames.com. If you have already purchased the route from FLG, then watch this video (https://youtu.be/nyuaMyYoA-E) on how to access and download files from www.hindustaanrailsim.com.

2023-06-21 - Anniversary Offer extension

The anniversary offer has been extended until June 22, 2023, 8 p.m.

2023-06-21 - Anniversary Offer has been started

FLG anniversary offer has been started. Offer is valid for today (21-June-2023) till 8:00PM.
